name: A shimmering silver mantle
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
